column1: Kata Robata////I have only been here three times --for a first date lunch
column2: for a second date for omakase (w a different person)
column3: and for happy hour. My experiences have all been great. The spreads
column5: have all been a delight to the eyes
column6: and (most importantly) to the tongue. At the end
column7: my tummy is always the best kind of sated: a fullness still tingling from the gastronomic delights. Additionally
column9: waiters and servers have the relaxed graciousness like the staff of good french restaurants. This is a place one can reliably expect to be culinarily impressed and still a vibe of a nice at-home dinner party w good people.
